Apache Solr Maven Plugin 0.0.7.1 API

Packages 
Package Description
com.ffbit.maven.solr
Provides Mojo goals for running Apache Solr instance during integration tests or as a standalone instance for other test purposes.
com.ffbit.maven.solr.artefact
Provides classes and interfaces to work and resolve Maven artifacts.
com.ffbit.maven.solr.artefact.external
Provides classes and interfaces to work and resolve external Apache Solr Maven artifacts.
com.ffbit.maven.solr.extract
Provides classes and interfaces to bootstrapping Apache Solr environment files.
com.ffbit.maven.solr.jetty
Provides classes and interfaces to Jetty.
